name: hOrnyWars
description:
hOrnyWars: Episode 4 is a visual novel with puzzle elements. All scenes are combined in one gripping plot.
Five awesome female characters in CG quality.
- The brave Turiel, Arwen's angelic girlfriend
- Arwen, a fox girl kidnapped by Lilith
- Lilith, a cunning hermaphrodite demoness!
- Innes, a badass cop!
- Nicole, a quiet Japanese secretary
and the Octopus!
Eight beautifully animated scenes!
Intriguing plot!
Addictive puzzles!
